attributes.title: Its a trap
attributes.review: This horrible app hacked my phone. As soon as I put my phone number in it it automatically made my phone start glitching and suddenly it was changing through screens without me touching it, I had to get a completely new phone and change my password to ALL OF MY ACCOUNTS. Do not do the same mistake I did, this app is only trying to track all of your informationğŸ˜¤

attributes.title: Awful App very disappointing
attributes.review: Many things were wrong with this app, the quality is terrible and there is false information stated frequently. There shows no good outcome for the future while using this app as it has promised. I want to see many improvements, but that seems unlikely and I would like to see this app taken down if it cannot improve.

attributes.title: no hope.
attributes.review: haha this apps a joke and so is Donald Trump. i downloaded the app to get a better understanding of why trump won the campaign and to also see if i have a chance of likening him. the app only shows you want trump wants you to see, fake news.  it also asked for my phone number and then proceeded to sell my information to other place and now I get random texts and calls.

attributes.title: Killed my family

attributes.title: I regret all of my actions , worst app ever
